D

DatabaseManager - Class in application
The DatabaseManager class is a singleton object (only one instance allowed).
deleteAllIngredientsForUser(User) - Method in class application.DatabaseManager
 
deleteAllRecipeIngredient(User, String) - Method in class application.DatabaseManager
Deletes all recipe ingredients attached to recipe_num;
deleteAllRecipes(User) - Method in class application.DatabaseManager
This method is for deleting all of the recipes as well as deleting all of the ingredients and steps attached to the recipes.
deleteAllRecipeSteps(User, String) - Method in class application.DatabaseManager
 
deleteCredentials(User) - Method in class application.DatabaseManager
This method is used to delete the credential passed in.
deleteCredentialsWithUserId(User) - Method in class application.DatabaseManager
This method is used to delete a credential from the database with the provided user id number.
deleteIngredient(User, String) - Method in class application.DatabaseManager
This method is used to delete the ingredient from the inventory list of the user.
deleteRecipe(User, String) - Method in class application.DatabaseManager
This method is used to delete the recipe passed in.
deleteRecipeIngredient(User, String, String) - Method in class application.DatabaseManager
This method is used to delete an ingredient from the provided recipe.
deleteRecipeSteps(User, String, String) - Method in class application.DatabaseManager
This method is used to delete a recipe step from a provided recipe.
